title: Taming His Mate
description: For shifter Logan Dix, being bonded to a Lone werewolf hasn’t been a bed of roses, especially when his mate, Kristof Two-Feather, won’t stick around long enough to settle. It’s enough to drive a Rogue Alpha to extreme measures like romantic getaways to Florida. But Dix’s plans to tame his mate are upended when the simple extraction job he was hired for goes sideways, placing Dix and Kristof in danger. Luckily, the two former Special Forces soldiers have plenty of practice getting out of trouble. It’s the settling down part that they need to get right, otherwise, Kristof’s Lone nature and Dix’s need to Bond will drive them apart. A 15,000 word novella. Book 2 in the Rogue Alpha Series. Claiming His Mate – Rogue Alpha Series Book 1 Trusting His Mate – Rogue Alpha Series Book 3
author: Lissa Ford
